body_html:
@panfengli Hello,
As you have mentioned, negative labels are not allowed. But, if there is a class label in target that is greater than n_classes, it must be defined as ignore_index. Otherwise, loss function does not work.
One more thing, converting target map to long is sometimes needed.
Thanks,

body:
@panfengli Hello,
As you have mentioned, negative labels are not allowed. But, if there is a class label in target that is greater than n_classes, it must be defined as ignore_index. Otherwise, loss function does not work. 
One more thing, converting target map to long is sometimes needed.
Thanks,
